name: raunchily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is clearly connected with sex: The film is deeply rooted in emotion and raunchily funny at the same time. She laughed raunchily. See
raunchy
More examplesFewer examplesThese women aren't particularly raunchily dressed.The show is raunchily watchable.The woman posing raunchily for the cameras was a glamour model.
